pages.text:
Dining & Events
Play
Dress Code
Proper attire is required at all times in all member and guest areas of the Clubhouse and Palm Terrace.
Members are responsible for advising their guests of the appropriate attire for any function or activity.
Reservations are Requested
Reservations are available for
Dining Room
Only.
Grill Room, Patio & Palm Terrace are first come, first serve

Member Login Instructions
All first time users will need to register in order to access the members only area. To do so, click on the Member Registration link below and enter your Member Number, First Name and Last Name as they appear on your account statement.
Once you have registered and validated your account you will be asked to create your own User Name and Password. You will only be asked to do this once.

Hours of Operation
Administrative Office Hours:
Monday through Friday:  8:30 am to 5:00 pm
& Saturday: 9:00 am to 1:00 pm
(November through April)
Monday, Wednesday, Thursday & Friday 8:30 am to 5:00 pm
Office Closed Tuesday, Saturday & Sunday (mid May to late October)
Pro Shop:
6:45 am to 5:00 pm
Late October to Early May
7:00 am to 3:00 pm
Early May to Late October
Closed Tuesdays
Closed Christmas Day
Pro Shop closes at 3 pm on most major holidays.
Restaurant Hours:
November through April:
Please refer to Newsletter and Weekly Highlights for daily hours of operation
May through October
Please refer to Newsletter and Weekly Highlights for daily hours of operation
Tuesday: Closed
Palm Terrace Hours:
Mid-October through Mid-May
Please refer to Newsletter and Weekly Highlights for daily hours of operation
For Dining Room reservations, please call 239-417-2555, option 1.
Holiday Hours:
Christmas Day: Closed
New Year's Day: Closed
*All hours of operation are subject to change without notice

Membership
Play
All residential owners are members of the Club, with full golf, racquet sports, pool, social and dining privileges.
Please click
here
for the 2025 General Information Fact Sheet.
NHGCC 2024/2025 Accomplishments
Home options - located throughout the community - include single family homes, condominiums, veranda units and villas.
For details on Homeowners Association fees, membership dues and other information, please contact the staff members listed below.
Administration Staff
(239) 417-2555, option 3
